alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 24 at 3:43AM MDT until April 25 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Locally higher amounts up to 10 inches expected in the Tetons. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions over Teton and Togwotee Passes. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most of the snow will occur today. Heavy snow will be possible over the Tetons this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
